timeline.bodyText: Must this really depend on the client? Usually it's the top level components that depend on shared:*
timeline.author: andreipaduroiu

timeline.bodyText: Why does this require a Set? Can a Collection be enough?
timeline.author: andreipaduroiu

replies.bodyText: The Application superclass requires a Set.
replies.author: co-jo

timeline.bodyText: Does this mean we need more work here?
timeline.author: andreipaduroiu

replies.bodyText: No, that reminder no longer applies.
replies.author: co-jo
